mixed-citation.article-title: Seven new giant pill-millipede species and numerous new records of the genus Zoosphaerium from Madagascar (Diplopoda, Sphaerotheriida, Arthrosphaeridae)

tp:treatment-sec.p: MADAGASCAR – Antsiranana • 3 juvs ; Marojejy ; 14°26′ S , 49°45′ E ; alt. 700 m ; 10–17 Nov. 1993 ; NHMD .
Three more specimens have been collected from the type locality. Zoosphaerium smaragdinum is currently classified as Near Threatened ( Rudolf & Wesener 2017c ) on the IUCN Red List.
